entry.title: Tahoe Tack 34" x 38" American Pride Bald Eagle New Zealand Wool Western Saddle Blanket
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Saddle Blankets
Price: 119.99

Show your American Pride with this stunning Stars and Stripes Series Patriotic Blanket by Tahoe Tack. This unique and luxurious saddle blanket is adorned with the ultimate symbol of American freedom, the mighty Bald Eagle, sitting atop the American flag. This 34 x 38” Western saddle blanket is made from 100% pure New Zealand Wool, renowned for its luxurious feel, quality, and strength. This wool is breathable and moisture-wicking which helps to increase your horse's comfort by preventing overheating and excess sweating. Our tightly woven designs have been constructed to last for many years to come with proper care. This patriotic American flag design saddle blanket is hand-woven and features white stars on a blue background, paired with red and white alternating stripes. Our beautiful patriotic blanket is sure to look stunning in any parade, event, or contest you use it in.

  • HANDWOVEN PATRIOTIC DESIGN - this beautiful patriotic stars and stripe design blanket is completely hand-woven and dyed by skilled craftsmen for supreme durability and beauty that will last many years with proper care.
  • A PARADE WORTHY PAD - our saddle blanket was meticulously designed in the USA and features embroidered stars on top of hand-woven tight-knit 100% New Zealand Wool for a beautiful finish that is sure to look stunning in parades, events, and contests.
  • BALD EAGLE DESIGN - this flashy saddle blanket features an American bald eagle on either side of the blanket, atop our American flag Stars and Stripes print. This beautiful patriotic design is sure to wow in any competition, event, or parade.
  • PERFECTLY SHAPED STARS - this premium saddle blanket features perfect hand-shaped stars, unlike other inferior blankets that have misshapen hand-woven stars. This careful detail gives this blanket a smoother and cleaner finish compared to others.
  • MAKES A STUNNING RUG - this saddle blanket isn't just for horses, but is also great for your home! This beautiful 34 x 38" stars and stripes blanket can be laid flat to turn it into an attractive hand-woven patriotic rectangular rug.


Care Instructions

This Western saddle blanket should be regularly cleaned and maintained in order to ensure your horse's comfort and prolong the lifespan of the blanket. Never machine wash or dry your blanket. Instead, you should regularly clean it of dirt and fur by gently brushing it with a soft brush. Next, use a vacuum hose to remove any remaining debris from your blanket. Once your blanket is mostly clean, you can wash it with lukewarm to cold water and Woolite™ or specialty saddle pad cleaner to remove any further dirt and sweat. It's important that, after washing, you store your blanket properly on a rack without any tack on top of it to allow it to maintain its shape and thoroughly dry out.

entry.title: Tahoe Tack 34" x 36" Zara Cactus Solid New Zealand Wool Western Saddle Blanket
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Saddle Blankets
Price: 79.99

Step into the show ring with pride with this stunning Zara New Zealand Wool Western Show Blanket by Tahoe Tack. This 34 x 36” solid Western show saddle blanket is made from 100% pure New Zealand Wool, renowned for its luxurious feel, quality, and strength. This wool is breathable and moisture-wicking which helps to increase your horse's comfort by preventing overheating and excess sweating. Our tightly woven designs have been constructed to last for many years to come with proper care. Unlike inferior show blankets, ours have matching wear leathers for added durability and lifespan. Our blankets also feature brightly colored hand-painted leather cactus accents for added style and flair.

  • 100% NEW ZEALAND WOOL - our premium show blanket is made from pure New Zealand Wool. This wool is breathable and moisture-wicking for increased comfort. Our tightly woven designs have been constructed to last for many years with proper care.
  • HAND-PAINTED LEATHER ACCENTS - this stunning saddle blanket has a pair of hand-painted leather accents on either side of the back of the blanket. These hand-painted cacti add color and flair that is sure to be noticed.
  • HANDWOVEN SOLID DESIGN - this beautiful solid Western saddle blanket is completely hand-woven and dyed by skilled craftsmen for supreme durability and beauty that will last many years with proper care.
  • IDEAL FOR LAYERING - our Zara blanket measures 34 x 36” and is designed to be used on top of your regular saddle pad as a colorful and attractive show accessory. This blanket is a great way to add style without adding excess bulk.
  • STAND OUT IN THE RING - this unique solid show blanket features painted leather accents and is available in five different colors to best match your horse’s coat along with your tack and show attire. This blanket is sure to help you wow the judges!


Care Instructions

This Western saddle blanket should be regularly cleaned and maintained in order to ensure your horse's comfort and prolong the lifespan of the blanket. Never machine wash or dry your blanket. Instead, you should regularly clean it of dirt and fur by gently brushing it with a soft brush. Next, use a vacuum hose to remove any remaining debris from your blanket. Once your blanket is mostly clean, you can wash it with lukewarm to cold water and Woolite™ or specialty saddle pad cleaner to remove any further dirt and sweat. It's important that, after washing, you store your blanket properly on a rack without any tack on top of it to allow it to maintain its shape and thoroughly dry out.

entry.title: Tahoe Super Soft Cashmillon Western Saddle Blanket 34" X 36"
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tack Wholesale
Type: Saddle Blankets
Price: 19.95

SIZE AND WEIGHT - this saddle blanket is 36” x 34” and is lightweight at approximately 5 lbs.

HANDWOVEN - these blankets are hand woven by skilled artisans. Due to the nature of making these by hand, there might be slight differences in each product.

RED CASHMILON - features comfortable lightweight cashmilon yarn made from acrylic in a vibrant red. This material is extremely flexible soft and fine, perfect for a luxurious ride.

HAND WASH AND DRY ONLY - to keep this product in the best condition it requires hand washing and hang drying only.

Tahoe Tack Heavy Duty Red Cashmilon Saddle Blankets are made with soft and lightweight cashmilon yarn made from acrylic. These lightweight red blankets come in size 36” x 34”, and are handwoven by skilled artisans for maximum comfort. To keep this product in good care it requires only hand washing and drying.

entry.title: Tahoe Tack Heavy-Duty Shock-Absorbing Blocked New Zealand Wool Saddle Pad 36" x 34"
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tack Wholesale
Type: Saddle Pads
Price: 39.95

This pad is a warehouse find. It may have minor imperfections due to storage. It has not been used. No returns are allowed.

SIZE AND WEIGHT - this saddle pad is 36” x 34” and is heavyweight.

NEW ZEALAND WOOL - 100% of the topper is made from pure New Zealand wool. Wool from New Zealand is known to be stronger, thicker, and whiter. This allows the color after dying to be clean and clearer than darker wools, and the wool fibers are strong and durable.

EXTRA COMFORT AND ABSORBS SHOCK - features thick wool felt in the center to absorb shock and contours to horse's back to keep from shifting. The added New Zealand wool topper is extra comfort and support to an already very thick saddle pad.

ULTRA-SOFT SYNTHETIC FLEECE LINING - is perfect for the horse and helps wick away moisture.

HAND WASH AND DRY ONLY - to keep this product in the best condition it requires hand washing and hang drying only.

WEAR LEATHERS - this pad features wear leathers which are made of quality leather for increased durability. This prevents the pad from fraying and ensures long-lasting use.

This saddle pad is composed of 100% New Zealand Wool topper, with a wool felt inner layer and thick synthetic fleece against the horse. Wear leathers are also in place to prevent pad fraying and to ensure long-lasting use. This product is perfect for western riders at any equine event! Each saddle pad is patterned. To keep this product in good care it requires only hand washing and drying. The size of this pad is 36” x 34” and remarkably thick with padding. This product is designed to absorb shock and bring the rider and the horse extra comfort.

entry.title: Tahoe Tack Contoured Comfort Pressure-Relieving Pure New Zealand Wool 36x34" Saddle Blanket
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Saddle Blankets
Price: 37.95

This saddle blanket is designed for comfort. Ideal for high withered horses, as the gentle contour helps prevent additional pressure on the spine. Shaped with no center seam. Perfect for western riders. 36" spine length x 34"

  • 100% New Zealand Wool. Soft yet durable and allows the horse's skin to breathe
  • Contoured shape with no seam for a comfortable fit
  • Designed to fit the horses' back perfectly
  • Each blanket is approximately 3.65 lbs
  • 36" spine length x 34"

SIZE AND WEIGHT - this saddle blanket is 36” x 34” and weighs approximately 5 lbs.

HANDWOVEN - these blankets are hand woven by skilled artisans. Due to the nature of making these by hand, there might be slight differences in each product.

NEW ZEALAND WOOL - 100% of the blanket is made from pure New Zealand wool. Wool from New Zealand is known to be stronger, thicker, and whiter. This allows the color after dying to be clean and clearer than darker wools, and the wool fibers are strong and durable.

HANDWASH AND DRY ONLY - to keep this product in the best condition it requires hand washing and hang drying only.

MULTIPLE COLOR OPTIONS - these saddle blankets come in a variety of colors: Green, Black, Red, Pink, Royal Blue, Sweet Pink, and Raspberry. The colors appear bright and clear on the fine wool blankets.

Tahoe Tack Heavy-Duty Solid Color  Pure New Zealand Wool Saddle Blankets are made with heavy duty wool by Tahoe. Lowest price for these heavy-duty saddle blankets! They come in the size 36" x 34" and weigh approximately 5 lbs. To keep this product in good care it requires only hand washing and drying. It comes in multiple colors including  Green, Black, Red, Pink, Royal Blue, Sweet Pink, and Raspberry all appearing bright and clear on the soft, durable, and hand-woven New Zealand wool.

entry.title: Tahoe Tack Western Canvas Contoured Wool Felt Extra Comfort Saddle Pad
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Saddle Pads

This Contour western saddle pad is one of the best on the market. It is perfect for any rider providing ultimate comfort for both the horse and the rider. This contour saddle pad is available in seven beautiful colors: black, brown, pink, purple, royal blue, red, or tan. The saddle pad is even washable if need. Just hand wash and hang dry on the fleece side up. They are perfect for any color western saddle whether your saddle is fancy and detailed or a plain color saddle. Your saddle pad color can tell a lot about your personality. You will not be disappointed in fact you will even come back for another color. This rugged saddle pad is made of a 7/8" fleece lining topped with a rugged canvas top and genuine leather wears, and features a soft fleece lining to keep your horse as comfortable as possible. These pads are both contoured to fit the back, and stitched to promote maximum shock absorption.
  • FEATURES - This contour saddle pad features a 7/8" fleece lining as well as genuine distressed leather tan wear leathers. 
  • SIZE - The spine measures 32" long with a total width length of 34". This sizing is typically used for a full horse.
  • COLORS - This pad is available in seven fun colors for every personality. The colors available are black, brown, pink, purple, tan, or red. 

Instructions:

Hand wash and hang dry, fleece side up
